results.title: Determination of trace elements and electrolyte levels in kidney tissue of simvastatin-treated septic rats.
results.text_hl: As a result of examining the kidney tissues under a light microscope, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ improved @DISEASE_Soft_Tissue_Injuries @DISEASE_MESH:D017695 @@@tissue damage@@@ caused by @CHEMICAL_Lipopolysaccharides @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008070 @@@LPS@@@-induced @<m>DISEASE_Acute_Kidney_Injury</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D058186 @@@acute kidney injury@@@.

results.title: Rhabdomyolysis Induced by the Interaction Between Ribociclib and Statins- Case Report and Literature Review
results.text_hl: ...A diagnosis of @<m>DISEASE_Acute_Kidney_Injury</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D058186 @@@acute kidney injury@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Acute_Kidney_Injury</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D058186 @@@AKI@@@) secondary to @DISEASE_Rhabdomyolysis @DISEASE_MESH:D012206 @@@rhabdomyolysis@@@ was made, and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_ribociclib @CHEMICAL_MESH:C000589651 @@@ribociclib@@@ were stopped following the diagnosis.

results.title: Simvastatin: a review.
results.text_hl: The only important, although rare, adverse effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ is @DISEASE_Muscular_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D009135 @@@myopathy@@@, an effect shared by all members of the class; when severe, this can take the form of @DISEASE_Rhabdomyolysis @DISEASE_MESH:D012206 @@@rhabdomyolysis@@@, which may lead to @<m>DISEASE_Acute_Kidney_Injury</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D058186 @@@acute renal failure@@@.

citations.NLM: Pedersen TR, Tobert JA. Simvastatin: a review. Expert Opin Pharmacother. 2004 Dec;5(12):2583-96. PMID: 15571475
citations.BibTeX: @article{15571475, title={Simvastatin: a review.}, author={Pedersen TR and Tobert JA}, journal={Expert Opin Pharmacother}, volume={5}, number={12}, pages={2583-96}}

results.title: Acute kidney injury in statin initiators.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSIONS: As a class, statin initiation was not associated with an increase in @<m>DISEASE_Acute_Kidney_Injury</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D058186 @@@AKI@@@. However, higher-potency @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ did exhibit an increased @<m>DISEASE_Acute_Kidney_Injury</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D058186 @@@AKI@@@ risk.

citations.NLM: Layton JB, Brookhart MA, Jonsson Funk M, Simpson RJ Jr, Pate V, Stürmer T, Kshirsagar AV. Acute kidney injury in statin initiators. Pharmacoepidemiol Drug Saf. 2013 Oct;22(10):1061-70. PMID: 23960024
